hero.titlePrefix: A coach you can talk to.
hero.titleHighlight: Not a dashboard you have to figure out.
hero.subtitle: YOUB knows your data, but also your daily life. Training is created through dialogue – together with you.

chat.title: Analytics Chat
chat.user1: I feel tired, but intervals are on the schedule.
chat.ai1: Your feeling matches your data. Today is a full day – let's adjust the training.
chat.ai2: Tomorrow has more space. Then we'll tackle the intervals.

problem.title: Your training competes with your daily life.
problem.subtitle: You want to reach your goal. But between work, family, and daily life, there's often no time to analyze training data and constantly make new decisions.

pillar1.title: Lack of Time
pillar1.text: You want to train effectively. But not plan, evaluate, and question everything every single day.

pillar2.title: Mental Overload
pillar2.text: Too many decisions. Too many numbers. Too little clarity.

pillar3.title: Rigid Plans
pillar3.text: Plans expect perfect weeks. Your daily life isn't like that.

solution.title: More than a Plan. An intelligent nervous system for your performance.

block1.title: Real-time Adaptivity
block1.text: YOUB doesn't just stubbornly plan ahead. Our AI continuously analyzes your data from Garmin, HRV and sleep. When your body needs rest, YOUB detects it before you slip into overtraining. We replace static plans with dynamic intelligence.

block2.title: A Coach That Speaks to You
block2.text: Don't feel like navigating complex dashboards? YOUB proactively reaches out to you – via WhatsApp or app. Like a real trainer, YOUB gives you feedback, motivates you, or slows you down when necessary. Simple, human, direct.

block3.title: Science Instead of a Black Box
block3.text:
Behind every recommendation is a clear decision-making path, built on sports science and the rules used by HYCYS in practice.
We use AI to make this decision path understandable, conversational, and suitable for everyday use not to generate training plans in a black box.

magicMoment.line3: Instead a dialogue that creates clarity.

trust.text: YOUB combines athletic experience with scientific methodology. Built by athletes, developed with data – for decisions that work in everyday life.

forYou.title: For You
forYou.subtitle: YOUB is for you if:
forYou.item1: you are a triathlete, cyclist, or runner
forYou.item2: you train performance-oriented and pursue clear goals
forYou.item3: you already collect training data and want to understand more from it
forYou.item4: you are ready to trust your training process

notForYou.title: Not right now
notForYou.subtitle: YOUB is currently not for you if:
notForYou.item1: you are just starting with endurance training
notForYou.item2: you don't use training data or wearables
notForYou.item3: you consciously want to train without structure

waitlist.title: Secure your spot in the first beta.
waitlist.subtitle: We are starting with a limited beta phase. Sign up and get access as soon as a spot becomes available.
waitlist.microcopy: No credit card required. GDPR compliant. Notification when a spot is available.

seo.title: YOUB - Training That Adapts to Your Life
seo.description: YOUB is your intelligent AI coach for triathlon, cycling, and running. We combine sports science with real-time data analysis for your optimal training.
